text: Coveñas Airport is a military airport serving the Caribbean coast town of Coveñas in the Sucre Department of Colombia. The runway is adjacent to the shore, and north departures and arrivals are over the Gulf of Morrosquillo. == Airlines and destinations == {| class="wikitable" !Airline !Destination |- |SARPA |Seasonal charter: Medellin-Olaya Herrera |} ==See also== * * *Transport in Colombia *List of airports in Colombia ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - Coveñas *OurAirports - Coveñas *SkyVector - Coveñas *FallingRain - Coveñas Airport * * Category:Airports in Colombia Category:Colombia transport-related lists
title: Coveñas Airport
